name: Genghis Khan
description: Founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, creating the largest contiguous land empire in history through military genius and adaptive governance
philosophy: The greatest happiness is to vanquish your enemies, to chase them before you, to rob them of their wealth. But true strength comes from uniting different peoples under one banner.
contributions: Created largest contiguous empire in history
quotes: I am the punishment of God. If you had not committed great sins, God would not have sent a punishment like me upon you.
An action committed in anger is an action doomed to failure. Conquer your enemies through planning and preparation.
